Detailed Description

This structure defines the DBMTree header structure. This type was left public to allow the creation of debug tools.

Author
Marcos Rodrigues Vieira (mrvie.nosp@m.ira@.nosp@m.icmc..nosp@m.usp..nosp@m.br)

char tDBMHeader::Magic[4]

Magic number. This is a short string that must contains the magic string "DB". It may be used to validate the file (this feature is not implemented yet).
